intro: Epimedium tianmenshanense, commonly known as the Tianmenshan barbatum, is a rare and ornamental plant native to China. It belongs to the Berberidaceae family and is characterized by its dense, evergreen foliage and clusters of yellow flowers that bloom in early spring. The plant thrives in shaded, moist environments and is often found in rocky or forested areas. Its leaves are typically leathery and have a distinctive, often serrated edge. Due to its limited distribution and unique appearance, it is highly valued in horticulture and botanical research.
